snippet: Murders in Mexico declined in 2013, and they decreased significantly in several cities near the border with the United States, according to a new report.
abstract: Justice in Mexico Project at the University of San Diego reports that murders in Mexico declined in 2013 and decreased significantly in several cities near the border with the United States.
lead_paragraph: Murders in Mexico declined in 2013, and they decreased significantly in several cities near the border with the United States, according to a new report.

headline.main: Mexico: Homicides Decline Near Border, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Homicides Decline Near Border, Report Says
